name: Angry Video Game Nerd VS Ganon
overview: Angry Video Game Nerd VS Ganon is a ROM Hack of The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past based on The Angry Video Game Nerd on YouTube. This ROM Hack was a sequel to another ROM Hack “AVGN VS Dr. Wily“. After the Angry Video Game Nerd killed Dr. Wily and avenge Mega Man’s death. The Nerd found a Time Machine in Dr. Wily’s Lab. The Nerd drink too many Rolling Rock Beers while time traveling. The Nerd was too drunk to travel back in time to prevent Dr. Wily killing Mega Man. The Nerd ended up going back in time way too far and ended up killing Link in the land of Hyrule and past out drunk laying in Link’s bed. This ROM Hack supports MSU1 with Audio Tracks from The Angry Video Game Nerd Episodes and other games that AVGN reviewed. Plus with FMV of The Angry Video Game Nerd Techno Theme Intro Remix. The player’s lives was set to 1 hit KO. If you get hit once, you’re dead! Game Over. The enemies are now triple less damage. Most of the crack wall marks are invisible to make secret areas hard to find. Most of the dialogues was changed.
